duties_responsibilities.duty: Set strategic direction for information security initiatives, processes, and standards
Establish enterprise architecture standards, processes, and procedures based on industry standards
Research, evaluate, and drive next-generation security technologies and concepts to keep supported enterprise security architecture ahead of the curve
Build relationships and collaborates with other Enterprise Architects and functional areas across to ensure all visions are aligned and in compliance with the enterprise information security program
Conduct and attend project meetings to provide security and governance input throughout project lifecycles
Participate in security event investigations, producing Incident Response Documentation and ensuring corrective actions are implemented

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Informatics, Computer Programming, Information Assurance and Compliance, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
